templates.template: SELECT K.TABLE_NAME, K.CONSTRAINT_NAME, C.CONSTRAINT_TYPE , K.COLUMN_NAME, K.ORDINAL_POSITION FROM information_schema.table_constraints C INNER JOIN information_schema.KEY_COLUMN_USAGE K ON C.table_schema = K.table_schema AND C.TABLE_NAME = K.TABLE_NAME WHERE 1=1 <#if (schema != '')> AND C.table_schema='${schema}' </#if> <#if (table_name != '')> AND C.TABLE_NAME='${table_name}' </#if> ORDER BY K.CONSTRAINT_NAME, ORDINAL_POSITION

SELECT T.TABLE_NAME , T.TABLE_COMMENT , C.COLUMN_NAME , C.COLUMN_COMMENT , C.DATA_TYPE AS DAT_TYP , C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH DAT_LEN , C.NUMERIC_SCALE DEC_LEN , case when C.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' then 'Y' else 'N' end IS_NULLABLE , C.COLUMN_DEFAULT , C.COLUMN_TYPE , C.COLUMN_KEY , C.ORDINAL_POSITION , C.EXTRA FROM information_schema.tables t inner join information_schema.columns C on T.TABLE_SCHEMA = C.TABLE_SCHEMA and T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME WHERE 1=1 <#if (schema != '')> AND T.table_schema='${schema}' </#if> <#if (table_name != '')> AND T.TABLE_NAME='${table_name}' </#if> ORDER BY C.ORDINAL_POSITION

SELECT T.TABLE_NAME , T.TABLE_COMMENT , T.TABLE_TYPE , T.`ENGINE` , T.TABLE_ROWS FROM information_schema.tables t WHERE 1=1 <#if (schema != '')> AND T.table_schema='${schema}' </#if> <#if (table != '')> AND T.TABLE_NAME LIKE CONCAT('%','${table}', '%') </#if>

WITH WTB_LIST AS( SELECT * FROM ( SELECT T.table_name , T.table_comment , C.column_name , C.column_comment , C.data_type , C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH len , C.NUMERIC_SCALE scale , case when C.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' then 'Y' else 'N' end is_nullable , C.column_default , C.column_type , 1 AS col_cnt , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.column_name ORDER BY IFNULL(C.COLUMN_COMMENT, '') DESC, IFNULL(T.TABLE_COMMENT, '') DESC, T.TABLE_NAME) AS rank01 FROM information_schema.tables t inner join information_schema.columns C on T.TABLE_SCHEMA = C.TABLE_SCHEMA and T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME WHERE T.table_schema = DATABASE() AND T.TABLE_NAME IN (${tables}) AND C.COLUMN_NAME IN (${cols}) ) T WHERE RANK01 = 1 ) SELECT * FROM WTB_LIST UNION ALL SELECT T.* FROM ( SELECT T.table_name , T.table_comment , C.column_name , C.COLUMN_COMMENT , C.DATA_TYPE , C.CHARACTER_MAXIMUM_LENGTH LEN , C.NUMERIC_SCALE SCALE , case when C.IS_NULLABLE = 'YES' then 'Y' else 'N' end IS_NULLABLE , C.column_default , C.column_type , 1 AS col_cnt , ROW_NUMBER() OVER( PARTITION BY C.column_name ORDER BY IFNULL(C.COLUMN_COMMENT, '') DESC, IFNULL(T.TABLE_COMMENT, '') DESC, T.TABLE_NAME) AS RANK01 FROM information_schema.tables t inner join information_schema.columns C on T.TABLE_SCHEMA = C.TABLE_SCHEMA and T.TABLE_NAME = C.TABLE_NAME WHERE T.table_schema = DATABASE() AND C.COLUMN_NAME NOT IN (SELECT COLUMN_NAME FROM WTB_LIST) AND C.COLUMN_NAME IN (${cols}) ) T WHERE T.RANK01 = 1
